alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Jasper; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 10:55AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northeast, and west central Georgia. This includes the following counties: Butts, Jasper, Barrow, Henry, Morgan, Newton, Rockdale, Walton, Clarke, Jackson, Madison, Oconee, Lamar, Pike, Spalding, Talbot and Upson. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A swath of locally heavy rainfall from Greenville to Athens this morning will set the stage for possible additional flooding as scattered showers and thunderstorms affect the area today and Friday, as well as a more organized area of heavy rain moves into the area on Saturday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
